metadata.title: CVE-2021-35307 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 through v1.6.0-636. A NULL pointerdereference exists in the AP4_DescriptorFinder::Test component located in/Core/Ap4Descriptor.h. It allows an attacker to cause a denial of service(DOS).

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
